articles.title: DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman Blasts U.S. Misinterpretation of Satellite Launch as Ballistic Missile Launch
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman Blasts U.S. Misinterpretation of Satellite Launch as Ballistic Missile Launch
 Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry gave the following answer to a question raised by KCNA Monday as regards the U.S. persistent insistence that the DPRK launched a ballistic missile, not a satellite, and its moves to make it an established fact:
					 Kwangmyongsong-2, satellite the DPRK legitimately launched on April 5 after going through necessary procedures according to international law, was accurately put into orbit 9 minutes and 2 seconds after its launch and it is regularly going round the earth.
					
					 The DPRK's satellite launch was aimed at independent scientific researches and development for the peaceful use of outer space.
					
					It is not important to get somebody's recognition. To acquire necessary capability is enough for us.
					
					 Even the U.S. scientific research institutions and military research institutes as well as military information institutions confirmed the successful launch of the satellite.
					
					 It is only the U.S. administration and unsavory forces subservient to it that insist the DPRK's satellite launch was a ballistic missile launch.
					
					 The UNSC pressurized by the high-handed practices of the U.S. so ambiguously interpreted the DPRK's satellite launch as just a "launch" in the "presidential statement" that it could not clarify what it actually criticized.
					
					 The political aim sought by the U.S. through the above-said insistence is to secure a pretext for applying sanctions against the DPRK at any cost and physically suffocate its national defence industry.
					
					 With nothing can the U.S. justify such illegal provocation as forcing the UNSC to table the issue of the DPRK's launch of satellite for peaceful purposes and issue "a presidential statement" with no binding force in a bid to apply sanctions against it.
					
					 All the facts go to clearly prove that although the present U.S. administration plays tricks, talking about "change" and "multi-lateral cooperation diplomacy" it is nothing different from the preceding administration which frantically worked to stifle by force other countries which incurred its displeasure.
					
					 It is the lesson taught by the reality of the international relations today that strength alone can defend one's sovereignty.
					
					 The DPRK is firmly convinced that it was entirely just when it opted for bolstering the nuclear deterrent to protect the sovereignty and the right to existence of the country and the nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Late Choe Ki Chol
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Late Choe Ki Chol
 Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il on May 3 sent a wreath to the bier of the late Choe Ki Chol, recipient of Order of Kim Il Sung and People's Designer, who is room chief of the Paektusan Architectural Institute, expressing deep condolences over Choe's death.

articles.title: Yang Hyong Sop Meets Vietnamese Delegation
articles.content:
Yang Hyong Sop Meets Vietnamese Delegation
 Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with a friendly delegation of the Vietnam Union of Friendship Organizations led by General Secretary Dao Duy Tien at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Monday.

articles.title: Chinese Delegation Here
articles.content:
Chinese Delegation Here
 Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- A Chinese government scientific and technological delegation headed by Vice-Minister of Science and Technology Cao Jianlin arrived here today to participate in the 43rd meeting of the DPRK-China inter-governmental committee for scientific and technological cooperation.

articles.title: "Day of China" Marked
articles.content:
"Day of China" Marked
Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- Students in Pyongyang and Chinese students studying in the DPRK had a joint friendly gathering at Kim Il Sung University on May 4 on the occasion of the "Day of China". 
					The Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, his staff members and Chinese students were present there on invitation. 
					
					 Present there were officials concerned and students from different universities here. 
					
					 Speakers at the gathering referred to the fact that the DPRK-China friendship provided by the revolutionaries of the elder generation is now daily developing on good terms under the deep care of the top leaders of the two countries.
					
					They expressed belief that the events taking place on the occasion of "year of DPRK-China friendship" would mark an occasion of deepening the friendship between the peoples of the two countries.
					
					 There was an art performance given by students of the DPRK and Chinese students at the gathering. 
					
					 A quiz on Chinese idioms was followed by colorful sports and amusement games.
					
					 There was also a basketball game between Korean and Chinese students.
					
					 Prior to the gathering, the participants placed floral baskets before the statue of President Kim Il Sung on Mt. Ryongnam and paid tribute to him.

articles.title: Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- The participants in the 11th Pyongyang Symposium on Medical Science of Koreans at home and abroad placed a floral basket before the statue of President Kim Il Sung on Mansu Hill on Monday.
					 They laid the floral basket and bouquets before the statue in humble reverence for the President and made bows.

articles.title: Aphorism Indicating Truth of National Development under Socialism
articles.content:
Aphorism Indicating Truth of National Development under Socialism
 Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- "It is not socialism but capitalism that checks the development of the nation."
					This aphorism of General Secretary Kim Jong Il contains the noble truth that capitalism is the main obstacle to the development of the nation and its independent development and prosperity can be achieved only under socialism.
					
					 The true development and prosperity of the nation can be achieved only in the socialist society.
					
					 The key to national development is to achieve equality and unity among the members of the nation and channel their interests in one direction.
					
					 The capitalist society based on mammonism and egoism is an anti-popular society where the interests of the bourgeoisie are defended. It inevitably causes social inequality and antagonism between the exploiter and the exploited classes.
					
					 Social equality and national unity cannot be achieved and unfettered development of the nation is impossible in the capitalist society where the members of the nation are divided into antagonistic classes owing to their conflicting interests.
					
					 In the socialist society based on collectivism all the members of the nation are equal as masters of the state and society and they take an active part in national development with sincere interests in it.
					
					 In the socialist society the unity of the popular masses is the inexhaustible driving force and main guarantee of national development and it is lawful that the development and prosperity of the nation is accelerated with the steady advance of socialism.
					
					 Over the unforeseen and abnormal situation in which socialism collapsed in some countries toward the end of last century the imperialists and their mouthpieces claimed that socialism is inferior to capitalism in bringing development to the nation.
					
					 History, however, shows that it was a ridiculous sophism distorting and fabricating truth.
					
					 Today it has become an irresistible trend among the progressive people of the world and the current of the times to ardently aspire after and defend socialism.

articles.title: UN Should Not Allow Itself to Be Abused for Serving Specified Forces' Hegemonic Purposes
articles.content:
UN Should Not Allow Itself to Be Abused for Serving Specified Forces' Hegemonic Purposes
 Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- The United Nations is by no means the world body to be abused for implementing the policies of such specified forces as the U.S. for aggression and domination.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes this in a signed article.
					
					 It cites facts to prove that aggressions and wars were frequent in different parts of the world for the past more than six decades of the existence of UN but in many cases it failed to take practical measures to prevent them.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Wrong resolutions were adopted by the UN and implemented. The responsibility for this entirely rests with the U.S., a permanent member nation of the UN Security Council. 
					
					 While pursuing its policy of aggression and war towards other countries and nations in the past, the U.S. used the signboard of UN when the situation was favorable to it and unilaterally behaved in disregard of UN when the situation was unfavorable to it.
					
					 Recalling that the UNSC keeps adopting unjust documents still today under the pressure of the U.S., the article notes that this is clearly evidenced by the recent "presidential statement" of the UNSC critical of the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes.
					
					 It continues: Throughout the history of the UN the UNSC has never called into question launches of satellites for peaceful purposes. This being a hard reality, it tabled and discussed the issue of the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes only and took such a brigandish step as adopting the unprecedentedly unreasonable "presidential statement." This was an extremely unfair application of double standards and arbitrary practice.
					
					 The UNSC also perpetrated such grave provocation as illegally implementing sanctions against the DPRK under the pretext of the "presidential statement" which has no binding force. The recent unjust action taken by the UNSC goes to prove that the UN can neither ensure global peace and security nor properly observe the principles of international justice and impartiality as long as the U.S. is allowed to continue pursuing unilateral, hegemonic and high-handed policies, sitting on the hardcore mechanism of the UN.
					
					 The only way of defending the sovereignty of the country and nation and ensuring peace and security is for each country and nation to bolster up its military muscle for self-defence by relying on its own strength.
					
					 The UN should draw a serious lesson of history, abide by the principles of international justice and impartiality and properly exercise its authority. Only then can the UN gain confidence of the international community and make a fair contribution to ensuring global peace and security and the sound development of the international relations.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Misbehavior Blasted
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Misbehavior Blasted
 Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- It is a very dangerous adventure for the south Korean authorities to mull fully participating in the U.S.-led PSI aimed at tightening the military blockade against the DPRK and isolating and stifling it and joining in the unreasonable "sanctions" of the UN against it. This warning is served by Rodong Sinmun Monday in a signed commentary.
					 It goes on: 
					
					The south Korean authorities are keen to get involved in the reckless rackets about which the public at home and abroad is so concerned. This cannot be construed otherwise than extremely reckless and bellicose moves to drive the inter-Korean relations to the brink of war in collusion with outside forces, utterly indifferent to the peace of the Korean Peninsula and the lives and security of the Koreans. 
					
					 Traitor Lee Myung Bak's talk about the full participation in the PSI brought to light once again his true colors as a war maniac bereft of reason as he does not rule out even a war against the DPRK, standing in confrontation with it to the last. 
					
					 The Lee group warmly hailed the unreasonable decision of the UN to apply "sanctions" against the DPRK and opted to play the role of a shock brigade in implementing them. This goes to prove that these traitors are no more than faithful lackeys of the imperialist aggression forces and their servants in the war of aggression against the DPRK. 
					
					 The Lee group is sadly mistaken if it calculates it can attack the DPRK in collusion with the imperialist aggression forces. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities should bear in mind they will have to pay dearly for their rash actions to do harm to the DPRK in collusion with outside forces. 
					
					 If the Lee group continues bedeviling the inter-Korean relations and driving the situation on the Korean Peninsula to catastrophe, trumpeting about the full participation in the PSI and "implementation of sanctions" of the UN defying the warnings of the DPRK, it will be held wholly accountable for the ensuing serious consequences.

articles.title: DPRK's April Holidays Commemorated in China
articles.content:
DPRK's April Holidays Commemorated in China
 Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- The first Dandong Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia Show, the Shenyang Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia Show and a remembrance meeting took place in Liaoning Province, China and a DPRK book, photo and handicraft exhibition in Jilin Province, China from April 10 to 24 on the occasions of the Day of the Sun and the 77th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army. 
					 Displayed in the venues of the events were hundreds of potted Kimilsungias and Kimjongilias, photos introducing the DPRK, books and photos dealing with the development of the friendly relations between the DPRK and China and handicrafts showcasing the wisdom and skills of the Korean people.
					
					 Speeches were made at the opening ceremonies of the shows.
					
					 Wang Dongping, general manager of the Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia Greenhouse in Dandong, made a detailed account of how the immortal flowers came into being in the world. He evinced his determination to widely propagate the flowers and contribute what little he could to significantly decorating the "year of Sino-DPRK friendship".
					
					 Yang Hongzhun, general manager of the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Greenhouse in Hunchun, warmly hailed the opening of the immortal flower show, adding that the show would greatly contribute to making the "year of Sino-DPRK friendship" more significant and  promoting the friendship between the two countries and developing the exchange in flower cultivation. 
					
					 He noted that the above-mentioned flowers are being rapidly propagated not only in China but in different countries of the world.
					
					 The general manager of a foreign economic trade company in Shenyang expressed belief that the immortal flowers loved by humankind will be in fuller bloom in different parts of the world, renewing the will of the company to make every possible effort to propagate the flowers worldwide. 
					
					A letter to General Secretary Kim Jong Il was adopted at the remembrance meeting held under the sponsorship of the Institute for Korean Studies in Liaoning Province.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Ministry Statement Supported
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Ministry Statement Supported
Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- Figures of different countries fully supported the statement issued by the DPRK Foreign Ministry on April 14.
					 The secretary general of the Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee said in a statement on April 24 that the DPRK's satellite launch was an exercise of the sovereign right and an example of scientific and technological development for developing countries to follow.
					
					 He bitterly denounced the UNSC for issuing the brigandish "presidential statement" aimed at applying sanctions against the DPRK and expressed full support to the statement issued by the DPRK Foreign Ministry.
					
					 He evinced his determination to boost the friendship and solidarity with the Korean people in the future, too. 
					
					Trotsky Serano, international secretary of the Socialist Party-Ample Front of Ecuador and president of the Canar Provincial Institute for the Friendship and Solidarity with DPRK of Ecuador, noted in a statement on April 21 that it is an invariable principle of the front to support the socialist cause of the DPRK.
					
					 The progressive people warmly hailed the successful launch of the satellite made by the scientists and technicians of the DPRK by their own efforts in the spirit of self-reliance, he stressed.
					
					 He noted that the DPRK advancing under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il disclosed before the whole world the UNSC's wanton violation of the rights stipulated in international law. 
					
					 M. M. Alhassan, chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, when interviewed by a radio reporter of the country on April 15, vehemently denounced the UNSC for issuing its "presidential statement" critical of the DPRK's  satellite launch under the pressure of the U.S. and its followers.

articles.title: Puppet Authorities' Misrule Flayed
articles.content:
Puppet Authorities' Misrule Flayed
 Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- The Democratic Labor Party of south Korea issued a statement on May 1 denouncing the unpopular rule of the puppet authorities. 
					 The statement deplored that the worker's life is deteriorating under the Lee Myung Bak regime.
					
					 The statement accused the authorities of working hard to make a retrogressive revision of "the law on the part-time job" and "law on the minimum wages," etc., while unilaterally imposing sufferings resulting from the economic crisis upon the workers. 
					
					 It assailed the Lee group for desperately holding in check the struggle of the members of the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions, opposed to the unity of the workers. 
					
					 Noting that Lee's touted "economic recovery" is no more than hypocrisy and it is meaningless as it ignores the existence of the workers, the statement called for struggling to build a society where the toiling people become its master and the right to work is guaranteed.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il presencia la funcion de la Opera "La florista"
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il presencia la funcion de la Opera "La florista"
Pyongyang, 4 de mayo (ATCC) -- El Dirigente   Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea presencio la funcion de la Opera Revolucionaria "La florista" junto los obreros de ramas de la industria metalurgica y de empresas vinculadas, participantes en la festividad por el Primero de Mayo.
					  A traves de la funcion "La florista", los artistas del Conjunto Operistico Mar de Sangre demostraron la inagotable vitalidad de las operas revolucionarias de Corea que hacen una gran contribucion a la forja del destino de la humanidad por la independencia y a la lucha revolucionaria de las masas populares.
					
					  El Dirigente se mostro muy satisfecho de que los artistas de dicho onjunto describieron excelentemente la demanda de obra original de la opera revolucionaria "La florista" dedicando todas las inteligencias y el entusiasmo con el mismo espiritu y el mismo impetu manifestados en los dias de la revolucion operistica y evaluo altamente el exito de funcion de ellos.
					
					  Senalo que las nuevas operas al estilo coreano creadas en el proceso de la revolucion operistica causan la gran repercusion tanto entre nuestro pueblo como entre los demas pueblos de numerosos paises del mundo por su alto nivel ideo-artistico y subrayo que contar con tales bienes ideo-espirituales y literario-artisticos como las operas revolucionarias al estilo de "Mar de sangre" constituye nuestro gran orgullo.
					
					  Nuestras operas revolucionarias, entre otras, "Mar de sangre", "La florista" y "Cuento de una enfermera" que tienen la eterna vitalidad sirven de excelentes  manuales de la educacion clasista para educar de manera revolucionaria a las nuevas generaciones venideras, destaco y anadio que es necesario dinamizar las actividades de funcion para mostrarlas a muchos trabajadores, militares y jovenes y ninos.
					
					  Presento las tareas que se presentan en la creacion artistica y las actividades de funcion.
					
					  Se refirio a que a lo largo de la larga y ardua trayectoria de la lucha, nuestra clase obrera vino demostrando sin reserva el aspecto majestuoso de las filas de fidelidad que apoyan con certeza la idea y la direccion del partido y el lider y del grueso revolucionario que tiene la firme posicion independiente antiimperialista y los principios socialistas.
					
					  Dijo que gracias a que tal fidedigno grueso de la clase obrera impulsa energicamente la construccion de la potencia economica, es cierta la victoria de Corea en la construccion de una gran potencia prospera.
					
					  Le acompanaron en verla el ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares Kim Yong Chun, los secretarios del Comite Central del PTC Choe Thae Bok, Kim Jung Rin y Kim Ki Nam, el vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema Yang Hyong Sop, el secretario del Presidium de la APS Choe Yong Rim, el ministro de Cultura Kang Nung Su, el primer viceministro de Relaciones Exteriores Kang Sok Ju, los cuadros directivos del CC del PTC, los generales de ejercito del Ejercito Popular de Corea Kim Myong Guk, Hyon Chol Hae, Ri Myong Su, Kim Won Hong y otros miembros directivos del ejercito.

articles.title: Portavoz del MINREX condena a EE.UU.
articles.content:
Portavoz del MINREX condena a EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 4 de mayo (ATCC) -- A la pregunta de un reportero de la Agencia Telegrafica Central de Corea formulada en relacion con que Estados Unidos maniobra todavia para calificar a toda costa el lanzamiento de satelite artificial por la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea del misil balistico, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC respondio el dia 4 como sigue:
					El satelite artificial "Kwangmyongsong No. 2" que la RPDC lanzo justamente el 5 de abril pasando por todos los tramites requeridos por el derecho internacional entro correctamente en su orbita a los 9 minutos y 2 segundos y funciona ahora normalmente.
					
					  Este lanzamiento de satelite es para el desarrollo de la investigacion cientifica independiente dedicado al uso del cosmos para fines pacificos.
					
					  Para nosotros no necesita el reconocimiento de alguien sino nos importa solo poseer la capacidad necesaria al respecto.
					
					  Los organismos de investigacion cientifica, los institutos que se dedican exclusivamente a los asuntos militares y los organos de inteligencia militar de EE.UU. confirman el lanzamiento exitoso del satelite.
					
					  Solo la administracion norteamericana y las fuerzas malsanas que persiguen a ella tildan nuestro lanzamiento de satelite  del misil balistico.
					
					  En su "declaracion "presidencial" el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU, doblegado ante la fuerza coercitiva de EE.UU., expreso ambiguamente solo como "lanzamiento" en cuanto al lanzamiento del satelite sin aclarar claramente el objeto de su censura.
					
					La intencion politica de EE.UU. de calificarlo del lanzamiento de misil balistico reside en asfixiar fisicamente la industria de defensa nacional de la RPDC al inventar de todas maneras el pretexto de sancion.
					
					  No puede justificar con nada el ilegal acto provocativo de EE.UU. que puso en practica la sancion contra la RPDC, luego de someter coercitivamente el lanzamiento de dicho satelite al Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU y  publicar la "declaracion presidencial" carente de la fuerza restrictiva.
					
					  Los hechos demuestran que la actual administracion de EE.UU. que habla tanto del "cambio" y la "diplomacia de cooperacion multilateral", es igual a su anterior administracion que habia recurrido freneticamente a aplastar con la fuerza a los paises que no le agradan.
					
					 Es posible defender solo con las fuerzas su soberania, lo cual es la leccion sacada de las actuales relaciones internacionales.
					
					  Estamos firmemente convencidos de que es mil veces justo el que optamos el camino para fortalecer aun mas la fuerza disuasiva nuclear destinada a defender la soberania y el derecho a la vida del pais y la nacion.

articles.title: CRPP denuncia belicismo de EE.UU. y la horda de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
CRPP denuncia belicismo de EE.UU. y la horda de Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 4 de mayo (ATCC) -- Hace poco, el comandante de las tropas agresoras norteamericanas ocupantes del Sur de Corea dijo que aunque fuera traspasado al Sur de Corea el "control de mando de las operaciones en el tiempo de guerra", "seguira siendo valido el tratado de defensa mutua surcoreano-estadounidense y se cumplira seguramente la promesa de Estados Unidos en cuanto al ofrecimiento del paraguas nuclear".
					 Continuo que "esta preparando el plan operacional para hacer frente a las eventualidades" junto con la Junta de los Jefes del Estado Mayor del ejercito titere surcoreano anadiendo que este plan ya fue ejercitado por ellos y es aplicable inmediatamente en las contingencias".
					
					 Ademas, pronuncio unas palabras belicosas como que "el Sur de Corea y EE.UU. mantendran la disposicion de entrar inmediatamente en el combate a traves del  y el ".
					
					  Por otra parte, los interesados del ejercito titere surcoreano se unieron a tales palabras belicosas del comandante yanqui diciendo que "se proponen a informar el plan avanzado a Chongwadae (Casa Azul) hasta finales de este mes" y "esta ultimado el plan que presenta en detalles las contramedidas".
					
					  En su declaracion publicada el dia 3, el portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) condeno categoricamente las palabras belicistas de ese comandante gringo y las maniobras belicistas anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea de los titeres surcoreanos seguidores a el calificandolas de declaracion de la confrontacion militar total con ella y de accion sumamente peligrosa encaminada a desatar la guerra nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana acabando con las relaciones entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea.
					
					  Ahora EE.UU. y la horda de Lee Myung Bak andan enloquecidos por el enfrentamiento con la RPDC y la campana belicista contra esta tildando el lanzamiento del satelite artificial ejecutado por ella con fines pacificos de supuesta "provocacion", "amenaza" e "infraccion de la resolucion de la ONU", revela la nota.
					
					  La situacion actual -prosigue- demuestra evidentemente que la politica hostil a Corea de EE.UU. no se cambio ni en lo mas minimo y los compinches de Lee son traidores y belicistas de pesima calana que actuan desesperadamente para imponer a la nacion coreana los desastres de guerra nuclear en contubernio con las fuerzas foraneas.
					
					  Puesto que se puso en claro el malsano intento de provocar la guerra de EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos que sirven como vanguardia de este imperio, la RPDC marchara directo por el camino de incrementar las fuerzas disuasivas nucleares para autodefensa como ya lo habia aclarado, sentencio.
					
					  EE. UU. y la pandilla de Lee Myung Bak deben parar ahora mismo sus imprudentes maniobras belicistas al conocer bien de su rival.

articles.title: China: actividades por efemerides coreanas
articles.content:
China: actividades por efemerides coreanas
Pyongyang, 4 de mayo (ATCC) -- Con motivo del Dia del Sol (15 de abril, cumpleanos del Presidente Kim Il Sung) y del 77o aniversario de la fundacion del Ejercito Popular de Corea, tuvieron lugar del 10 al 24 de abril la primera Exposicion de Kimilsungias y Kimjongilias de Dandong, la otra exposicion de Shenyang y el cenaculo de recordacion en la provincia de Liaoning y la exhibicion de libros, fotos, bordados y productos de artes menores de Corea en la provincia de Jilin, respectivamente.
					  En los lugares de actos estaban exhibidos centenares de Kimilsungias y Kimjongilias, las fotos que dan a conocer la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, los libros y fotos alusivos al desarrollo de las relaciones de amistad Corea-China, los bordados y productos artesanales que reflejan la inteligencia y talentos del pueblo coreano.
					
					  En las ceremonias inaugurales de los eventos hubo discursos.
					
					  El administrador general del Invernadero de Kimilsungias y Kimjongilias de Dangdong, Wang Dongping, explico detalladamente el proceso de nacimiento de  las citadas flores y apunto que contribuira sus esfuerzos a adornar significativamente el "Ano de amistad China-Corea" al desarrollar ampliamente la divulgacion de dichas flores en futuro tambien.
					
					  El administrador general del Invernadero de Kimilsungias y Kimjongilias de Hunchun, Yang Hongzhun, felicito ardientemente la apertura de la exposicion de susodichas flores y apunto que la presente exposicion hara un gran aporte a decorar con  significacion el "Ano de amistad China-Corea", fomentar la amistad entre los dos paises y desarrollar el intercambio de plantas decorativas. 
					
					  Prosiguio que hoy, la Kimilsungia y la Kimjongilia estan divulgadas rapidamente a China y varios paises del mundo.
					
					  El administrador general de una Compania de Economia y Comercio Exterior de Shenyang expreso su conviccion de que tales flores que ama la humanidad abriran plenamente sus petalos en todas las partes de los 5 contenientes y subrayo que ellos haran todos sus esfuerzos por divulgarlas en el ambito mundial.
					
					  En el cenaculo de recordacion auspiciado por el Instituto para el Estudio de Corea en la provincia de Liaoning, fue aprobada una carta al Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
